mapper.select: select P.* from (select * from pReservation where airport = #{airport}) P where #{startDate} between startDate and endDate or #{endDate} between startDate and endDate or startDate >= #{startDate} and endDate <=#{endDate}
mapper.delete: delete from pReservation where pResNum = #{pResNum} and password = #{password}
mapper.select: select * from pReservation where carNum = #{carNum} and password = #{password}
select * from pReservation where phone = #{carNum} and password = #{password}
select airport, sum(rate) rate from airline.pReservation where endDate like CONCAT(#{pm}, '%') group by airport order by airport asc
select airport, sum(rate) rate from airline.pReservation where endDate like CONCAT(#{tm}, '%') group by airport order by airport asc
select airport, count(rate) areaNum from airline.pReservation where date(now()) between startDate and endDate group by airport order by airport asc
select * from pInfo order by aName asc

select A.airport, count(B.pResNum) areaNum from (select distinct airport from pReservation) A left outer join (select * from airline.pReservation where date(now()) = endDate) B on A.airport = B.airport group by A.airport order by airport asc

select A.airport, count(B.pResNum) areaNum from (select distinct airport from pReservation) A left outer join (select * from airline.pReservation where date(now()) = startDate) B on A.airport = B.airport group by A.airport order by airport asc

select P.* from (select * from pReservation where airport = #{airport} and areaNum=#{areaNum}) P where #{startDate} between startDate and endDate or #{endDate} between startDate and endDate or startDate >= #{startDate} and endDate <=#{endDate}
